org.xchain.framework.scanner

Class VfsProtocolScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.scanner.VfsProtocolScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolScanner

    public class VfsProtocolScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProtocolScanner

    A protocol handler for jboss 5.0.0 urls with protocols "vfszip", "vfsfile", and "vfsmemory". This protocol handler interfaces with the VirtualFile objects exposed by jboss to build a tree of nodes to scan.

    Author:
    Christian Trimble

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        public void scan(ScanNode rootNode,
        java.net.URL vfsUrl)
          throws java.lang.Exception

        Scans the VFS URL and adds the nodes in that url to the root node.

        Specified by:
        scan in interface ProtocolScanner
        Parameters:
        rootNode - the root node of the resource tree.
        vfsUrl - the root URL to scan. The openConnection() method of this URL must return a connection of type VirtualFileURLConnection.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
